metadata.title: CVE-2024-41022 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Fix signedness bug in sdma_v4_0_process_trap_irq()The "instance" variable needs to be signed for the error handling to work.
